#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, n, ct;

	scanf("%d", &t );
	cin.ignore();

	while( t-- ) {
		
		string s;
		ct = 0;
		getline( cin, s );
		
		n = s.length();

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) 
			if( s[ i ] == ' ' )
				ct++;
		if( n ) 
			ct++;

		printf("%d\n", ct );
	}

	return 0;
}
